node.Title: Terraform Cloud no-code provisioning adds module version upgrades in beta
node.Description: No-code provisioning adds more Day 2 operations. Users can now update the module version used in their no-code workspaces.

node.Title: Amazon Bedrock Is Now Generally Available – Build and Scale Generative AI Applications with Foundation Models
node.Description: This April, we announced Amazon Bedrock as part of a set of new tools for building with generative AI on AWS. Amazon Bedrock is a fully managed service that offers a choice of high-performing foundation models (FMs) from leading AI companies, including AI21 Labs, Anthropic, Cohere, Stability AI, and Amazon, along with a broad set […]

node.Title: Hyperdrive : donner aux bases de données l'impression d'être mondiales
node.Description: Hyperdrive vous permet d'accéder très rapidement à vos bases de données existantes à partir de Cloudflare Workers, quel que soit leur lieu d'exécution

node.Title: Hyperdrive: Damit Datenbanken global wirken
node.Description: Hyperdrive macht den Zugriff auf Ihre bestehenden Datenbanken von Cloudflare Workers aus hyperschnell, egal wo sie laufen

node.Title: Hyperdrive: cómo hacer que las bases de datos parezcan globales
node.Description: Hyperdrive te permite un acceso ultrarrápido a tus bases de datos existentes desde Cloudflare Workers, dondequiera que se ejecuten

node.Title: Hyperdrive：データベースをあたかもグローバルであるかのように感じさせる
node.Description: Hyperdriveは、実行中の場所を問わず、Cloudflare Workersから既存のデータベースにアクセスすることを可能にします

node.Title: Hyperdrive: 데이터베이스를 글로벌하다고 느껴지게 만들기
node.Description: Hyperdrive는 어디에서 실행되든 Cloudflare Workers에서 기존 데이터베이스에 액세스하는 것을 매우 빠르게 만듭니다

node.Title: Hyperdrive：让数据库拥有全球分布式性能
node.Description: Hyperdrive 让 Cloudflare Workers 快速访问您的现有数据库，无论它们位于何处，都能获得优越性能

node.Title: Hyperdrive: making databases feel like they’re global
node.Description: Hyperdrive makes accessing your existing databases from Cloudflare Workers, wherever they are running, hyper fast

node.Title: Race ahead with Cloudflare Pages build caching
node.Description: Unleash the fast & furious in your builds with Cloudflare Pages' build caching. Reduce build times by caching previously computed project components. Now in Beta for select frameworks and package managers.

node.Title: Re-introducing the Cloudflare Workers Playground
node.Description: Today, we’re excited to announce an updated Cloudflare Workers playground, where users can develop and test Workers before sharing or deploying them

node.Title: Running Serverless Puppeteer with Workers and Durable Objects
node.Description: We’ve heard from developers that configuring and maintaining their own serverless browser automation systems can be quite painful. The Workers Browser Rendering API solves this

node.Title: A Socket API that works across JavaScript runtimes — announcing a WinterCG spec and Node.js implementation of connect()
node.Description: Engineers from Cloudflare and Vercel have published a specification of the connect() sockets API for review by the community, along with a Node.js compatible implementation of connect() that developers can start using today

node.Title: Cloudflare Integrations Marketplace introduces three new partners: Sentry, Momento and Turso
node.Description: Earlier this year, we introduced integrations with Supabase, PlanetScale, Neon and Upstash. Today, we are thrilled to introduce our newest additions to Cloudflare’s Integrations Marketplace – Sentry, Turso and Momento

node.Title: D1: open beta is here
node.Description: D1 is now in open beta, and the theme is “scale”: with higher per-database storage limits and the ability to create more databases, we’re unlocking the ability for developers to build production-scale applications on D1
